format.description: The desired format of the room composition.

resolution.description: The desired resolution (width/height in pixels) of the resulting video of the room composition. Both width and height are required to be between 16 and 1280; and width * height should not exceed 1280 * 720

session_id.description: id of the room session associated with the room composition.

video_layout.description: Describes the video layout of the room composition in terms of regions.

webhook_event_url.description: The URL where webhooks related to this room composition will be sent. Must include a scheme, such as 'https'.

webhook_event_failover_url.description: The failover URL where webhooks related to this room composition will be sent if sending to the primary URL fails. Must include a scheme, such as 'https'.

webhook_timeout_secs.description: Specifies how many seconds to wait before timing out a webhook.
